languages.text: While under 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, Imperial world characters gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда у персонажа с имперского мира остается меньше 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} и +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While under 40% wounds, Imperial world characters gain a +10 bonus to all characteristics and +2 to resolve.

While under 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, Imperial world characters gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text: Solange sie weniger als 40 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} haben, erhalten Charaktere einer imperialen Welt einen +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} und +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text: While under 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, Imperial world characters gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange sie weniger als 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} haben, erhalten Charaktere einer imperialen Welt einen +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf alle Eigenschaften und +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des personnages des mondes impériaux est inférieure à 40 %, un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10 s'applique à toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, et leur {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} augmente de +2.
languages.original_text: While under 40% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, Imperial world characters gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des personnages des mondes impériaux est inférieure à 40 %, un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10 s'applique à toutes leurs caractéristiques, et leur {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} augmente de +2.

languages.text: 当帝国世界的角色{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于40%时，该角色所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

traits.locale_text: 当帝国世界的角色{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于40%时，该角色所有属性提高10点{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点。

languages.text: Mientras tengan menos del 40 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, los personajes de mundos Imperiales ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +10 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} y +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
